skins.shipDescription: Yorktown-class aircraft carrier ©` Yorktown, Hull Number CV-5!
skins.selfIntroduction: Lead ship of the Yorktown class aircraft carriers, Yorktown. Abandoned...? It wasn't their fault, but I do not have the courage to reach out for light from that darkness. Will you leave me, Commander? Or will you guide me by my hand...?
skins.acquisition: I am the lead ship of Yorktown class aircraft carriers, Yorktown. My name comes from the Siege of Yorktown... You know? In the Revolutionary War. Neutrality...? That's just a pre-war courtesy.
skins.login: Greetings, Commander. If there's a problem, please leave it to me.
skins.details: It's alright if you don't remember me...
skins.secretaryIdle1: This eagle really likes being with me, but is it alright for me to feed it...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, please do not confuse 42 with 24, no matter what
skins.secretaryIdle3: If there's time, maybe you should spend it with my younger sisters... I'm fine on my own
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Are you truly prepared to leave your mark on someone like me?

skins.shipDescription: Hey, Commander, are you lost? How about a drink? ... Huh? Drunk? Me? Oh, Commander, you're such a card. This is just grape juice... isn't it?
skins.acquisition: Hey, Commander, are you lost? How about a drink? ... Huh? Drunk? Me? Oh, Commander, you're such a card. This is just grape juice... isn't it?
skins.login: You're late, Commander. You know what THAT means. One penalty drink!
skins.details: Come to think of it, Enterprise did tell me not to drink the blue stuff like A MILLION TIMES. But like, what's the dig beal, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Enterprise is a good girl. So's Hornet. And Hammann. They all found their PLACE in this fleet. But me? The big sister? I'm HAPPY for them. And a teeeensy bit lonely.
skins.secretaryIdle2: You know, Commander, looking back, I have some regrets. Like if I knew you were THIS good? I'd've been more HONEST with myself.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh! Is that my cute little Hammann?! When did you get so BIG?! ...Oh, you're the Commander, aren't you? Have you seen Hammann?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hey, Commander, you wanna hear some EMBARRASSING stories about Enterprise and Hornet? Oh, you'd rather hear mine? Hehe, THAT can be arranged.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: OH! Commander, at least buy me a drink first!
